* add bootstrap role and resource ([#145](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/issues/145)) ([b8d5f8f](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/commit/b8d5f8f6739e4dee7414aeec00cd5494ba6c5917))

* operation localization afl ([#140](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/issues/140)) ([a41c158](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/commit/a41c1580c38f8e04026787b69f39afeacfb469a8))

* view feature role and rapyuta-io-user update ([#167](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/issues/167)) ([72941d8](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/commit/72941d862408009585abf14c16e9368b39c232f2))


### Bug Fixes

* base role needs more permission for system-ui ([#146](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/issues/146)) ([6e48adf](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/caddy-rrauth/commit/6e48adfbecfa1099e25f817fb8bb35f8e290fbb1))
